actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite and two Kicks or three Spit Worms.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 10 ft., one creature,. 18 (3d8+5) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison and target must make DC 16 Con save or be infested with parasitic cheek worm (see above) if grivid has at least 1 cheek worm.

actions.name: Kick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 18 (3d8+5) bludgeoning damage and target must make DC 16 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Spit Worm
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit 20/60' one creature. 13 (3d6+3) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) poison and target: DC 16 Con save or be infested with parasitic cheek worm (see above) if grivid has at least 1 cheek worm.

special_abilities.name: Cheek Worm Regrowth
special_abilities.desc: Has twenty worms stored in its cheeks. Used worms regrow when the grivid finishes a long rest.

special_abilities.name: Parasitic Cheek Worm
special_abilities.desc: Produces parasitic worms in its cheeks and it expels these worms into other creatures when it attacks. Worm burrows into target's flesh and that creature is poisoned while infested with at least one worm. At start of each of infested creature's turns it takes 5 (2d4) poison. Any creature can take an action to remove one worm with successful DC 12 Wis (Medicine) check. An effect that cures disease removes and kills one worm infesting the creature. When grivid dies all worms currently infesting creatures die ending infestation in all infested creatures.

special_abilities.name: Worm Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: If it has at least 1 hp grivid regains 5 hp for each worm infesting another creature at start of its turn.
